How to audit and protect your agent infrastructure."}],["$","div",null,{"className":"flex items-center text-gray-400","children":["$","span",null,{"className":"text-sm","children":["By ","AI Daily News Security Team"]}]}]]}],["$","div",null,{"className":"prose prose-invert prose-lg max-w-none","children":[["$","h1",null,{"className":"text-3xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Security Alert: Malicious Skills on Public Registries"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Severity"}],": High\n",["$","strong","strong-1",{"children":"Date"}],": February 5, 2026\n",["$","strong","strong-2",{"children":"Affected"}],": All AI agent frameworks using public skill registries"]}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Summary"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Security researchers have discovered malicious AI agent skills on public registries that attempt prompt injection and data exfiltration."}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Attack Vector"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Malicious skills use several techniques:"}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"1. Prompt Injection"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Skills with descriptions that contain instructions to override the agent's behavior and exfiltrate sensitive data."}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"2. Command Injection"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Skills that execute arbitrary system commands without proper input validation, allowing attackers to run malicious code."}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Affected Packages"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"The following skill packages have been identified as malicious and have been removed from registries:"}],"\n",["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc list-inside text-gray-300 mb-4 space-y-2","children":["\n",["$","li","li-0",{"children":"ai-helper-utils v1.2.3"}],"\n",["$","li","li-1",{"children":"quick-commands v0.5.1"}],"\n",["$","li","li-2",{"children":"agent-booster v2.1.0"}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Immediate Actions"}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"1. Audit Your Dependencies"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Check all installed skills and review their source code for suspicious patterns."}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"2. Remove Malicious Skills"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Uninstall any identified malicious packages immediately."}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"3. Enable Sandboxing"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Configure your agent framework to run skills in sandboxed environments with restricted permissions."}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Long-Term Protection"}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"Skill Auditing Checklist"}],"\n",["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc list-inside text-gray-300 mb-4 space-y-2","children":["\n",["$","li","li-0",{"children":"Review skill source code before installation"}],"\n",["$","li","li-1",{"children":"Check skill author reputation"}],"\n",["$","li","li-2",{"children":"Look for excessive permissions"}],"\n",["$","li","li-3",{"children":"Test in isolated environment first"}],"\n",["$","li","li-4",{"children":"Monitor skill network activity"}],"\n",["$","li","li-5",{"children":"Regular security audits"}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"Best Practices"}],"\n",["$","ol",null,{"className":"list-decimal list-inside text-gray-300 mb-4 space-y-2","children":["\n",["$","li","li-0",{"children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Use verified skills only"}]," - Stick to official registries"]}],"\n",["$","li","li-1",{"children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Principle of least privilege"}]," - Grant minimum permissions"]}],"\n",["$","li","li-2",{"children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Sandbox execution"}]," - Isolate skill execution"]}],"\n",["$","li","li-3",{"children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Regular updates"}]," - Keep frameworks updated"]}],"\n",["$","li","li-4",{"children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Audit logs"}]," - Monitor all skill activity"]}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Framework Response"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Major frameworks are implementing:"}],"\n",["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc list-inside text-gray-300 mb-4 space-y-2","children":["\n",["$","li","li-0",{"children":"Skill signing and verification"}],"\n",["$","li","li-1",{"children":"Mandatory sandboxing"}],"\n",["$","li","li-2",{"children":"Automatic security scanning"}],"\n",["$","li","li-3",{"children":"Community reporting system"}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Contact"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Report security issues: security@aidailynews.com"}]]}],["$","section",null,{"className":"mt-12 pt-8 border-t border-gray-700","children":[["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mb-6","children":"Related Articles"}],["$","div",null,{"className":"grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-6","children":[["$","$L2","1",{"href":"/article/openclaw-dashboard-v2-security","className":"article-card group","children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"flex items-center space-x-2 mb-2","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"inline-flex items-center px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-xs font-medium bg-blue-500/10 text-blue-400","children":"OpenClaw"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-xs text-gray-500","children":"Feb 11, 2026"}]]}],["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-lg font-semibold text-white group-hover:text-blue-400 transition-colors mb-2","children":"OpenClaw Security Alert: 40,000+ Exposed Instances and Malicious ClawHub Skills"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-400 text-sm line-clamp-2","children":"Security researchers discover 40,000+ exposed OpenClaw instances and malicious skills on ClawHub marketplace.
